author: game.changer.wallet
title: GameChanger: Dandelion Deployment
description: GameChanger used Dandelion Community Service to bootstrap, then its own deploy, and it now needs to scale up to support its growing adoption

f6_assessments.q0: GameChanger needs to scale to support growing applications. Describe the problem and solution that makes sense and is within the scope of the challenge. The given solution completely solves the problem.
f6_assessments.q1:
I fully believe that with the solution and plan presented here, there is a high probability that this proposal will be successfully implemented. The team is very experienced and has added several references to demonstrate its ability to provide this recommendation. The development plan is very detailed, shows many technical aspects and from my experience it is workable. A clear roadmap and budget allocation indicates a fair and equitable use of funds. In short, this project provides enough information that a successful implementation can be expected.
The proponent seems to have enough knowledge and experience to come up with good content as he is suggesting. Proposal to provide information about team members with relevant skills and experience to successfully execute the project
It would be better if the proponent had a list of potential future risks and challenges. To increase the probability of success of this proposal.
f6_assessments.q2:
The proponent offers a step-by-step plan for implementation with clear milestones, coherent KPI metrics, and defined timelines. A clear roadmap with 3-month milestones is provided
KPIs and project progress are explained very clearly there. Proposed data will allow for evaluation and monitoring of desired outcomes
The budget is clearly and succinctly defined, with a reasonable amount required

f6_assessments.q0: This proposal presents a clear problem and its solution is coherent. This solution is very well suited to the demands of the challenge, in that it proposes to develop the adoption of the LATAM region and contribute to the Dandelion network, developing new business opportunities and circles within the LATAM SPOs community. This potential impact on the ecosystem is clearly stated and correlates with the KIPs provided by their two targets of number of nodes deployed and number of LATAM operators.
f6_assessments.q1: The experience of each participant is detailed, coherent with the needs of this proposal and supported by links. For more information their website is provided as well as a video, which is appreciable. The information given is clear and concise, as is the budget which seems coherent and realistic broken down into identifiable items. The fact that they have already successfully deployed and sized their own Dandelion node is an indication of confidence. Similarly the risks are aware and quoted with an appropriate solution "the budget will be used to extend the period of time the nodes are kept up." And the technical aspects are addressed in an understandable way.
f6_assessments.q2: A roadmap is given with time indications and a horizon for achievement. The KIPs are logical with a very resonable quantitative goal. The awareness of a communication with the community is clearly described, their site allows to bring all the necessary information, their past projects are mentioned as well as their willingness to participate in the whole Catalyst process with their Project Catapult and their wish to help on Catalyst Community Tools On-Chain.

f6_assessments.q0: The team behind the GameChanger wallet wants to expand their infrastructure and decentralisation capabilities by deploying 3 nodes in 3 different countries in Latin America and sustain them for 3 months, in the process further contributing to the decentralisation of the Cardano Blockchain and the expansion of the Cardano Community. This is aligned with the goals of this challenge and the broader goal of Cardano of becoming ever more decentralised.
f6_assessments.q1: The team has provided verifiable links of the team’s members skills and their prior experience builds confidence in the success of this project. Not only that, but the team has presented a very detailed plan, proving that they have considered a lot of aspects in the execution of their proposal. I have no doubt that if funded the project will be successfully implemented.
f6_assessments.q2: The proposal delivers enough information to be properly evaluated if funded. The detailed plan, the roadmap, the KPIs, the budget is concise and cohesive, marking it as a potential successful project with easily verifiable goals.

solution: We propose to grow LATAM adoption and contributing back to Dandelion network by deploying 3 nodes in this region.
experience: We have made GameChanger, our product is a highly humanized and gamified wallet. We are committed to newcomers, students and builders.
